cropSelector.descriptionPage: Get suggestions for the best crops to grow. Provide details like land size, location, soil, and season.
cropSelector.placeholder: e.g., I have 2 acres of black soil land in Maharashtra. It's monsoon season with decent water availability.
cropSelector.resultPlaceholder: Your crop suggestions will appear here.
